name: orbi2d
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: 3bitr4g(w0, wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, w3), wi(wn(w1), w2), wi(wn(w1), w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wi(wn(w1), w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wb(wo(w1, w3), wi(wn(w1), w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wi(wn(w1), w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wb(wo(w1, w3), wi(wn(w1), w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wi(wn(w1), w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, w3)))
-| wb(wo(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w2))
-| wb(wo(w1, w3), wi(wn(w1), w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))

|- wi(w0, wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, w3)))
-| wb(wo(w1, w3), wi(wn(w1), w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))

|- wi(w0, wb(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))

comment: Deduction adding a left disjunct to both sides of a logical equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)
